newsitem.title: INDIA: Jordan shows interest in India sugar, rice imports.
newsitem.headline: Jordan shows interest in India sugar, rice imports.

text.p: Jordan has shown interest in the import of sugar and rice from India, the food ministry said on Monday.
A ministry statement said India's Minister for Food and Civil Supplies Devendra Prasad Yadav and the visiting Jordanian Minister for Supplies Munir H. Soubar discussed Indian sugar exports to Jordan.
"The Jordanian side also showed interest in import of rice," the statement said.
The two leaders agreed that state agencies of both countries would coordinate on the subject.
